name: Bionic Tadpole
description:
Every bullet has Bionic Tadpole's name on it as he escapes R-Man City in the stolen bionic suit!

Run-N-Gun, beat the timer, and don't let your gun overheat in this 2D Side-Scroller/Bullet-Hell Shooter/Platformer. 

Thanks to wonderful teachers like

Shaun Spaulding & Benjamin AKA HeartBeast

Without their tutorials, I would be so lost

Music Track Credit:  Pete Frogs   https://soundcloud.com/petefrogs

Controls:

--X Box Controller Strongly Recommended-- 

(although Mouse & Keyboard Compatible).

This is a twin-stick controlled platformer/shooter game.

Left stick controls player. Right stick controls gun. 

Shoot (RT) Power Shot (RB)  Jump (A)  Dash (X) Boost (LT)  *when acquired*

Start Button (Pause)

*hint*  Point the gun down, shoot and jump to increase jump.

--Mouse & Keyboard--

Mouse controls Gun 360 degrees

Move Left (A)  Move Right (D)  Jump (Space)  

Dash (Z)  Pause (P)  Game Reset (R) 

Fullscreen (ctrl F)

Shoot (Mouse LB)  Power Shot (Mouse RB)

Boost  (Mouse RB)  * when acquired*

After the Jam, I will continue to work on my game adding more levels and weapon upgrades as well as some cutscenes . Hope you all enjoy.
